author: ringstrom
msg: * STATUS: Add r11232 and r11285 to r11211.

author: ringstrom
msg: Followup to r11211 to fix a theoretical problem discovered by sussman.
We should check the readability of the directory entries at their last
committed revision, not the revision of the directory itself.  A
revision based authorization module is required for this to make any
difference, and even then it's something of an an edge case because it
only matters if a single commit contains both public and protected
paths.  Sussman's email is available here:
http://www.contactor.se/~dast/svn/archive-2004-10/0344.shtml
While at it, move some common code to a separate function as suggested
by kfogel.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/liveprops.c
(svn_svn_get_path_revprop): New function.
(dav_svn_insert_prop, dav_svn_get_last_modified_time): Use
svn_svn_get_path_revprop.

author: cmpilato
msg: Drastically reduce the amount of memory used by Subversion when
committing over RA-DAV.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/commit.c
(dup_resource): New.
(commit_open_dir, commit_add_dir, commit_open_file,
commit_add_file): Use a subpool to do all the nasty work, and only
persist what needs to be persisted in the passed-in pool.

author: ehu
msg: * subversion/po/es.po: merge r11282.

author: ehu
msg: Last mile for es.po.
Patch by: Ariel Arjona <beerfrick@gmail.com>
* subversion/po/es.po: Patched to be nearly complete.
